measure.name: air_terminal_supply_downstream_leak_to_return
measure.display_name: Air Leakage from Supply to Return
measure.description: This Measure simulates the effect of air leakages from the supply to return air without going into the zone.
measure.modeler_description: To use this Measure, choose the Coil:Cooling:DX:SingleSpeed object to be faulted and a fault level. Define the fault level as the ratio of the amount of refrigerant inside the object to the charge level recommended by the manufacturer. If the fault level is outside the range of zero and one, an error will occur.

argument.name: airterminal_choice
argument.display_name: Enter the name of the faulted AirTerminal object

argument.name: leak_ratio
argument.display_name: Ratio of leak airflow between 0 and 0.3.
